content: the daybreak tee is a slightly cropped tee that utilizes 1-3 inches of positive ease for a classic and flattering fit it is knit simply in the round from the bottom up then the front and back are separated and worked flat this pattern includes a 45 minute step-by-step video tutorial you are welcome to sell items knit from this pattern i just ask that you give pattern credit to knifty knittings and link to kniftyknittings com in any listings thank you pattern details yarn 3 3 3 4 4 4 skeins lb collection cotton jeans 100% cotton 218 yds/200 m per 100 g 457 532 599 672 748 825 yds/418 487 548 615 684 755 m needles us 6/4 mm 32 in circular needle us 7/4 50 mm 32 in circular needle notions stitch markers spare us 7/4 50 mm needle for 3 needle bind off yarn needle for weaving in ends and seaming gauge 18 sts and 25 row = 4 in/10 cm in stockinette stitch with us 7/4 50 mm needles blocked sizes xs s m l xl 2x to fit bust 28-30 32-34 36-38 40-42 44-46 48-50 in/71-76 81 5-86 5 91 5-96 5 101 5-106 5 112-117 122-127 cm finished garment circumference 31 35 39 43 47 51 in/78 5 89 99 109 119 5 129 5 cm kit is available from lion brand 1 1 http //www lionbrand com/knit-kit-daybreak-tee html sscid=51k3_3ozwv
